name: Kobold War Machine
description: A large, armored construct with exceptional physical strength and a design focused on battlefield dominance, featuring spiked wheels and fire breath.
memorable: Its ability to carry operators while being immune to numerous effects makes it a unique and powerful battlefield presence.
goals: To dominate the battlefield through damage output and structural destruction, while relying on skilled operators.
relations: Often operated by kobolds, enhancing their combat effectiveness.
environment: Typically found in war zones or areas where kobolds are preparing for battle.
strengths: High damage output; immune to many conditions and damage effects, making it hard to disable.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits its independent function; effectiveness depends heavily on the presence of operators.
attacks: Utilizes spiked wheel attacks for close combat and spits fire projectiles for ranged assaults.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath: Exhales a damaging cone of fire, dealing significant area damage.
skills: Possesses good athleticism, capable of showcasing impressive feats of movement.
additional_information: Immune to poison and psychic damage.
Can function normally with at least one operator.
Deals double damage to structures as a Siege Monster.
Can knock targets prone with a successful spiked wheel attack.
Requires skilled kobold operators to maximize effectiveness.
